message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 seems a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1350000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1350000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, but I need to be careful with my budget. Can you consider meeting me at $1250000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1325000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1325000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $1200000, so I'll offer $1225000. Can you consider this price?

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you closer to your target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1300000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me closer to my target, Alice. However, I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'll meet you halfway from $1225000 to $1300000, so I'll offer $1262500. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you closer to your target. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1290000. This is the final price I'm willing to consider. What do you think?
